::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tmap, sf, DT, stplanr, tidyverse)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
odbus <- read_csv("data/aspatial/origin_destination_bus_202210.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(odbus)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 5,122,925
Columns: 7
$ YEAR_MONTH          <chr> "2022-10", "2022-10", "2022-10", "2022-10", "2022-…
$ DAY_TYPE            <chr> "WEEKDAY", "WEEKENDS/HOLIDAY", "WEEKENDS/HOLIDAY",…
$ TIME_PER_HOUR       <dbl> 10, 10, 7, 11, 16, 16, 20, 7, 7, 11, 11, 8, 11, 11…
$ PT_TYPE             <chr> "BUS", "BUS", "BUS", "BUS", "BUS", "BUS", "BUS", "…
$ ORIGIN_PT_CODE      <dbl> 65239, 65239, 23519, 52509, 54349, 54349, 43371, 8…
$ DESTINATION_PT_CODE <dbl> 65159, 65159, 23311, 42041, 53241, 53241, 14139, 9…
$ TOTAL_TRIPS         <dbl> 2, 1, 2, 1, 1, 4, 1, 3, 1, 5, 2, 5, 15, 40, 1, 1, …
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
odbus$ORIGIN_PT_CODE <- as.factor(odbus$ORIGIN_PT_CODE) 
odbus$DESTINATION_PT_CODE <- as.factor(odbus$DESTINATION_PT_CODE) 
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
 odbus6_9 <- odbus %>%   filter(DAY_TYPE == "WEEKDAY") %>%   
   filter(TIME_PER_HOUR >= 6 & TIME_PER_HOUR <= 9) %>%   
   group_by(ORIGIN_PT_CODE, DESTINATION_PT_CODE) %>%   
   summarise(TRIPS = sum(TOTAL_TRIPS))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
busstop <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial",                    
                   layer = "BusStop") %>%   st_transform(crs = 3414)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial",                    
                layer = "MPSZ-2019") %>%   st_transform(crs = 3414)
```

:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz <- write_rds(mpsz, "data/rds/mpsz.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
 busstop_mpsz <- st_intersection(busstop, mpsz) %>%   
   select(BUS_STOP_N, SUBZONE_C) %>%   
   st_drop_geometry()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(busstop_mpsz, "data/rds/busstop_mpsz.rds")  
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
od_data <- left_join(odbus6_9 , busstop_mpsz,
                    by = c("ORIGIN_PT_CODE" = "BUS_STOP_N")) %>%   
                    rename(ORIGIN_BS = ORIGIN_PT_CODE, ORIGIN_SZ = SUBZONE_C, 
                    DESTIN_BS = DESTINATION_PT_CODE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
duplicate <- od_data %>%   
  group_by_all() %>%   
  filter(n()>1) %>%   
  ungroup()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
od_data <- unique(od_data)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
od_data <- left_join(od_data , busstop_mpsz,            
                     by = c("DESTIN_BS" = "BUS_STOP_N")) 
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
duplicate <- od_data %>%   
  group_by_all() %>%   
  filter(n()>1) %>%   
  ungroup()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
od_data <- unique(od_data)
```
:::


```{r} od_data <- od_data %>%   rename(DESTIN_SZ = SUBZONE_C) %>%   drop_na() %>%   group_by(ORIGIN_SZ, DESTIN_SZ) %>%   summarise(MORNING_PEAK = sum(TRIPS))}
   
```


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(od_data, "data/rds/od_data_fii.rds.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
od_data_fii <- read_rds("data/rds/od_data_fii.rds.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
od_data_fij <- od_data[od_data$ORIGIN_SZ!=od_data$DESTIN_SZ,]
```
:::


```{r} #| eval: false}
write_rds(od_data_fij, "data/rds/od_data_fij.rds")
```


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
od_data_fij <- read_rds("data/rds/od_data_fij.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
flowLine <- od2line(flow = od_data_fij,                      
                    zones = mpsz,                     
                    zone_code = "SUBZONE_C")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(flowLine, "data/rds/flowLine.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
flowLine <- read_rds("data/rds/flowLine.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(mpsz) +
  tm_polygons() + 
  flowLine %>%   
  tm_shape() +   
  tm_lines(lwd = "MORNING_PEAK", 
           style = "quantile", 
           scale = c(0.1, 1, 3, 5, 7, 10),           
           n = 6,            
           alpha = 0.3)
```
